description: Grafana dashboard for Angie (fork of nginx) web server metrics

panels.description: Active and Idle Connections (stacked)
panels.title: Connections

panels.description: Accepted/Dropped Connections
panels.title: New Connections

panels.description: Number of client requests received in an HTTP server zone (per second)
panels.title: Zone Received Requests

panels.description: Number of client requests currently being processed in an HTTP server zone
panels.title: Requests In Progress

panels.description: Number of client requests completed in an HTTP server zone without sending a response (per second)
panels.title: Zone Discarded Requests

panels.description: Count of responses with 100-399 Status Codes (per second)
panels.title: Server Zone Responses - 2xx/3xx Codes

panels.description: Count of responses with 400-499 Status Codes (per second)
panels.title: Server Zone Responses - 4xx Codes

panels.description: Count of responses with 500-599 Status Codes (per second)
panels.title: Server Zone Responses - 5xx Codes

panels.description: Amount of 4xx errors codes divided by all zone requests
panels.title: 4xx Error Rate

panels.description: Amount of 5xx errors codes divided by all zone requests
panels.title: 5xx Error Rate

panels.description: Number of client connections received in a stream server zone (per second)
panels.title: Zone Received Connections

panels.description: Number of client connections completed in a stream server zone without establishing a session (per second)
panels.title: Zone Discarded Connections

panels.description: Number of client connections currently being processed in a stream server zone
panels.title: Connections In Progress

panels.description: Number of client requests received in an HTTP server zone (per second)
panels.title: Location Zone Received Requests

panels.description: Number of client requests completed in an HTTP server zone without sending a response (per second)
panels.title: Location Zone Discarded Requests

panels.description: Amount of 4xx errors codes divided by all location zone requests
panels.title: Location 4xx Error Rate

panels.description: Amount of 4xx errors codes divided by all location zone requests
panels.title: Location 5xx Error Rate

panels.description: Number of unsuccessful attempts to communicate with an upstream peer in "HTTP".
panels.title: Upstream Health Failures

panels.description: Number of times when an upstream peer in "HTTP" became "unavailable" due to reaching the max_fails limit.
panels.title: Upstream Health Unavailable Events

panels.description: Number of attempts to use an upstream peer in "HTTP" (per second)
panels.title: Upstream Requests

panels.description: The number of requests currently being processed by an upstream peer in "HTTP"
panels.title: Upstream Requests In Progress

panels.description: The number of currently cached keepalive connections for an HTTP upstream.
panels.title: Upstream Keepalive Connections

panels.description: Amount of 4xx errors codes divided by all location zone requests
panels.title: Peer 4xx Error Rate

panels.description: Amount of 4xx errors codes divided by all location zone requests
panels.title: Peer 5xx Error Rate

panels.description: Number of responses processed in an HTTP cache zone with a specific cache status (per second)
panels.title: HTTP Cache Processed Responses

panels.description: Number of bytes processed in an HTTP cache zone with a specific cache status. (per second)
panels.title: HTTP Cache Processed Data

panels.description: Number of responses written to an HTTP cache zone with a specific cache status (per second)
panels.title: HTTP Cache Written Responses

panels.description: Number of bytes processed in an HTTP cache zone with a specific cache status. (per second)
panels.title: HTTP Cache Written Data

panels.description: Number of requests processed by an HTTP limit_conn zone with a specific result (per second)
panels.title: HTTP limit_conn Requests

panels.description: number of requests processed by an HTTP limit_reqs zone with a specific result (per second)
panels.title: HTTP limit_reqs Requests

title: Angie-Frontend
